A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is my favorite Star Wars movie out of all of them. I really enjoyed the storyline and the characters in this plot. I know people have nostalgic feelings with Darth Vader but I really believe Kylo Ren is a superior villain of the series. Overall\, it is a great movie with great action\, cinematography\, characters\, and storyline. Snoke was the only bad part of the film.
